title: Bronze 5 20th Promo Results [ no rant this time]
body:
after 20 promos In b5 I realize the more you win the worse your team gets. I look at win % of my team was 45% theirs was 50%. Only did my team get worse as I began to win. I'll record this to prove in another post. Below is my promos in past and present. At first I was really hard on myself and thought I sucked. But I think its something more. Give your thoughts!

the second last varus game I was 7-0 and team wouldnt group and I was left to chase which is not varus style. then got rekt'd
